block_comment: This block of code resets a write leveling rank counter every positive clock cycle. In detail, "wrlvl_rank_cntr" is assigned at the positive edge of the clock signal "clk". The timing control statement "#TCQ" specifies the output to change 3 clock cycles after the input changes, and "3'd0" is the decimal representation of "0" in 3-bit binary number, indicating the counter is reset to 0.
